snippet: Once a pugnacious and intimidating flamethrower, Joba Chamberlain is fighting his way back from reconstructive elbow surgery.
lead_paragraph: Once a pugnacious and intimidating flamethrower, Joba Chamberlain is fighting his way back from reconstructive elbow surgery.

headline.seo: Yankees’ Joba Chamberlain Hoping to Write Another Feel-Good Story
headline.main: Five Years Later, Yankees’ Chamberlain Hopes to Write Another Feel-Good Story
headline.print_headline: Five Years Later, Yankees’ Chamberlain Hopes to Write Another Feel-Good Story
